hibernate-mapping.query: select jd from Judgment jd,Legalcase lc where lc.id=jd.eglcLegalcase and lc.lcnumber=? order by jd.id desc
select jd from Judgment jd,Legalcase lc where lc.id=jd.eglcLegalcase and lc.lcnumber=? and jd.id!=? order by jd.id desc
from Judgment j where j.eglcLegalcase.id=? and j.judgmentType.judgmentType=? and j.sapAccepted=? ORDER BY orderDate desc
from Judgment j where j.eglcLegalcase.id=? and j.judgmentType.judgmentType=? and j.id!=? and j.sapAccepted=? ORDER BY orderDate desc
from Judgment j where j.eglcLegalcase.id=? and j.orderDate>=?
from Judgment j where j.eglcLegalcase.id=? and j.id!=? ORDER BY orderDate desc
from Judgment j where j.eglcLegalcase.id=? and j.id!=? and j.orderDate=?
select j.eglcLegalcase from Judgment j where j.id=?
from Judgment j where j.parent.id=? order by j.id
